title: Diamond Dotted Bangles Set
features: This elegant set of bangles features a dainty design with round cut diamonds dotting the circumference. The diamonds are set in a shared prong setting, creating a delicate and continuous sparkle. Its simple design offers an eye-catching bangle design.
description: A timeless design suitable for all ages. This bangle set makes a perfect gift for a loved one or a special treat for yourself. The rose gold adds warmth and sophistication.
